While Chaffetz and many others claim to have turned on Mueller only because he has taken too long or hasn’t produced any results — yet — it’s worth bearing in mind that the president was shrieking “witch hunt” when the Mueller probe wasn’t yet 24 hours old and he didn’t know where the office bathroom was, never mind the cache of torches he needed to hunt witches.
